item.title: GNOME shell
item.description: Since 2022, tricks written in my old キーボード入力モード選択 and its English translated description Debian Workstation (usability) (old)) – Keyboard shortcut customization (GNOME Settings) stopped working for me. This is how I came to update my memo to Debian Workstation (usability) (v2023) – Keyboard shortcut customization (GNOME Settings – custom shortcut). Keyboad shortcuts stopped working This breakage seemed to have happened with changes made in 2022. package bullseye (2021) bookworm (2023) gnome-shell 3.
